assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: TeamLease Services Limited provides human resource services to various industries in India. The company offers temporary staffing, permanent recruitment, payroll process outsourcing, regulatory compliance, vocational training/education and assessment, and IT and telecom staffing services; apprenticeship program and property leasing services; and online service for software product engineering. It provides its solutions primarily to consumer goods and durables, chemicals, manufacturing, media and telecom, retail, banking, financial services, insurance, e-commerce, pharmaceuticals and healthcare sectors. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
